    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_91151</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">La position du soleil à midi</string>
            <string language="en">Noon time location of the sun</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mittag Zeitstandort der Sonne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Posição do tempo do meio-dia do sol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Posizione di tempo di mezzogiorno del sole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρονική θέση μεσημεριού του ήλιου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Localización del tiempo del mediodía del sol</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme montre l'emplacement relatif du soleil à midi en Grande Bretagne et en Afrique du sud.  Le soleil est vu au sud à partir de la Grande Bretagne et au nord en Afrique du Sud.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows the relative location of the Sun during noon times in UK and South Africa.  The Sun is seen at a southerly position from UK and northerly position from South Africa.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">La terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">midi</string>
            <string language="en">noon time</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pôle Nord</string>
            <string language="en">north pole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Afrique du Sud</string>
            <string language="en">South Africa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pôle Sud</string>
            <string language="en">south pole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">le soleil</string>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">R-U</string>
            <string language="en">UK</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt den relativen Standort der 
Sonne während der Mittag Zeiten in Großbritannien und in Südafrika.
Die Sonne wird in einer Southerlyposition von der BRITISCHEN und
nördlichen Position von Südafrika gesehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra a posição relativa do sol 
durante tempos do meio-dia no Reino Unido e na África do Sul. O
sol é visto em uma posição do vento do sul da posição BRITÂNICA 
e northerly de África do Sul.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra la posizione relativa del 
sole durante i tempi di mezzogiorno nel Regno Unito ed in Sudafrica. 
Il sole è visto ad una posizione del southerly dalla posizione 
BRITANNICA e northerly dalla Sudafrica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει σχετική θέση του ήλιου 
κατά τη διάρκεια των χρόνων μεσημεριού στο UK και τη Νότια 
Αφρική. Ο ήλιος βλέπει σε μια νότια θέση από το 
UK και τη βορεινή θέση από τη Νότια Αφρική.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra la localización relativa 
del sol durante tiempos del mediodía en Reino Unido y Suráfrica. 
El sol se ve en una posición del viento del sur de la posición
BRITÁNICA y northerly de Suráfrica.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mittag Zeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nordpol</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Südafrika</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
